meanings.definition: The state or quality of being infrequent.
meanings.sent1: The infrequences of his visits made us miss him even more.
meanings.sent2: The infrequences of snow in our city make winter less exciting.
meanings.sent3: The infrequences of sunny days in this town are almost comical.
meanings.sent4: Her infrequences in responding to emails are like finding a rare gem.
meanings.sent5: The infrequences of shooting stars in the night sky always leave us in awe.

meanings.definition: The frequency of occurrence being low or rare.
meanings.sent1: The infrequences of power outages in our area are a relief.
meanings.sent2: The infrequences of winning the lottery are extremely slim.
meanings.sent3: The infrequences of traffic jams during holidays are a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent4: His infrequences in attending social events are like a mystery to us.
meanings.sent5: The infrequences of finding a four-leaf clover bring good luck to those who do.
